EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Mar13 HIPAA Omnibus Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName}: Thank you for registering for the HIPAA Risk Webinar. The login details are below.
Title: Liability for All: The Impact of the 2013 HIPAA Omnibus Rule on Law Firms Date: Wednesday, March 13 Time: 9am Pacific / 12pm Eastern Duration: 75 minutes
Video:
Conference URL: http://www.infiniteconferencing.com/Events/intapp/ Participant Code: 33443346
Audio:
US/Canada Audio Dial In: (888) 645-4404 UK Audio Dial In: 00 800 4747 4646 (You will not need to give the operator a passcode, just the title of the webinar)
http://www.intapp.com
